inclusion.criterion: Adults with relapsed and/or refractory myeloma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Zubrod Performance Status (ZPS) of 2 or better
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Peripheral neuropathy of grade II or higher
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has relapsed and refractory myeloma with adequate liver function and Zubrod Performance Status of 2 or better. However, thrombocytopenia is not mentioned in the patient's history.
